title: "Portland Trailblazers" font
content:
Please help me identify the font used in "portland trailblazers"

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [portland.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150310032237/http:/typophile.com/files/portland.jpg) | 43.73 KB |
author: rhenz.gupita

comments.content: That looks like [ITC Avant-Garde Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150310032237/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/avant-garde-gothic) Bold using alternate / [A](http://web.archive.org/web/20150310032237/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/avant-garde-gothic/pro-bold/glyphs.html#glyphs/541375/390).
